an3.4:1: "Bhikkhus, one who possesses three qualities should be known as a fool. What three?  He does not see his transgression as a transgression.  When he sees his transgression as a transgression, he does not make amends for it in accordance with the Dhamma.  When another person confesses a transgression to him, he does not accept it in accordance with the Dhamma. One who possesses these three qualities should be known as a fool.
an3.4:2: "One who possesses three qualities should be known as a wise person. What three?  He sees a transgression as a transgression.  When he sees a transgression as a transgression, he makes amends for it in accordance with the Dhamma.  When another person confesses a transgression to him, he accepts it in accordance with the Dhamma. One who possesses these three qualities should be known as a wise person.
